FuncDef: This command defines the default committed buffer size for the template queue. Overall, the cbs command follows the same behavior and provisioning characteristics as the cbs command in the queue-group or network QoS policy. The exception is the addition of the cbs-value qualifier keywords bytes or kilobytes.

ParaDef.Info: The size parameter is an integer expression of the number of kilobytes reserved for the queue. If a value of 10KBytes is desired, enter the value 10. A value of 0 specifies that no reserved buffers are required by the queue (a minimal reserved size can still be applied for scheduling purposes). Values-0 to 1048576 or default.
